Better luck next time, right, kupo? I'll take the compass back now...${prompt}
${color-alt: 15}${name-player} returns the compass to the moogle.
You know what to do now--get right back on your feet and try again! Just let me know if you're feeling up for it, kupo.${prompt}
What is it? Do you want to start over?${prompt}
Some sneaky scoundrels have swiped the armor we brought in for the Feast of Swords...again, kupo!${prompt}

As you probably already know, the villains wearing the armor are invulnerable to normal weapons! And as if that wasn't enough, they're surrounded by a powerful aura that prevents them from being attacked at all, kupo!${prompt}
Our top moogle researchers have created weapons that can injure these armor-thieving hooligans--the wondrous ${item-singular: 0[2]} and the marvelous ${item-singular: 1[2]}, kupo!${prompt}
The nomad moogles have also developed a magic that will annul that anti-attack aura, so be sure to pay them a visit while wearing the weapon before you engage the enemy, kupo.${prompt}
But be warned--this magic has the side effect of preventing you from attacking any other monster for three whole Vana'dielian days, kupo!${prompt}
This time we want to make sure that the wretched thieves have a hard time coming back, kupo!${prompt}
You see, even if you take one of them down, the power of the armor will slowly restore his health, and before you know it, the scoundrel will be back up to full health!${prompt}

It will create a ward that should slow the equipment's regenerative properties, making it easier for you to defeat them again and again, kupo!${prompt}
Just remember that the further away you travel from the ward, the weaker it becomes. We recommend staying in the same ${color: 5}area${color: 1} for best results.${prompt}
Alright. Here's your ${item-singular: 0[2]}. Now you're ready to do battle, kupo!${prompt}

Vana'diel is under attack by villains in our stolen samurai armor! Help the moogles in each nation defeat this menace, kupo!${prompt}
We've mixed up some moogle magic to crack that aura, but you'll need to equip a special weapon to even cause a scratch, kupo! Equip, I tell you! Equiiiiiip!${prompt}
It may be just the thing for whacking those wacky samurai! Hold still while I work my moogle magic, kupo!${prompt}
Oh, just don't forget to place the ward with your ${item-singular: 0[2]} when you've defeated one!${prompt}
You'll be able to really hurt those harbingers of harm with ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. Now hold still while I work my moogle magic, kupo!${prompt}
Oh, just don't forget to place the ward with your ${item-singular: 0[2]} or your ${item-singular: 1[2]} when you've defeated one!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Faites-moi savoir si vous êtes jamais curieux !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La Société des Chocobos de Vana'diel, ou SCV pour faire court, est une organisation internationale conçue pour former et envoyer des chocofilles et chocogars dans des écuries à travers Vana'diel.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ils proposent des cours sur l'équitation pratique des chocobos et les bonnes façons de prendre soin d'un chocobo, tout en travaillant à améliorer le traitement des chocobos d'ici à Aht Urhgan.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Tout le monde peut rejoindre tant qu'ils aiment les chocobos. La SCV vous aidera avec tout ce dont vous avez besoin.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les poussins éclosent des œufs, grandissent en jeunes chocobos, et mûrissent enfin.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ils grandissent beaucoup plus vite que les gens. Habituellement, il faut environ 1 mois (temps terrestre) avant de pouvoir monter votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les traits du chocobo sont déterminés par la façon dont vous prenez soin de votre animal. Sans planification adéquate, vous ne pourrez pas élever le type de chocobo que vous souhaitez.${prompt}
Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, car vous avez nous pour vous aider ! Nous sommes tous ensemble là-dedans !${prompt}
Demander à propos de quelle caractéristique ?
Force.
Discernement.
Réceptivité.
Énergie.

Phrase en Anglais: “Strength” is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Rien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “La force” est un terme utilisé pour décrire la puissance des jambes du chocobo. Plus un chocobo est fort, plus il pourra courir vite. Les chocobos de location ont été élevés en mettant l'accent sur cette caractéristique.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Endurance” is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La force et l'endurance sont collectivement désignées sous le terme d'"attributs physiques".${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “L'endurance” est un terme utilisé pour décrire l'endurance du chocobo. Si votre chocobo a une endurance élevée, vous pourrez le monter pendant une longue période.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Discernment” is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La force et l'endurance sont collectivement désignées sous le terme d'"attributs physiques".${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “Le discernement” est indispensable pour quiconque souhaite que son chocobo apprenne de nouvelles capacités. Vous voudrez peut-être envisager d'augmenter cette caractéristique si vous êtes intéressé par la recherche de trésors.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Receptivity” is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le discernement et la réceptivité sont collectivement désignés sous le terme d'"attributs mentaux".${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “La réceptivité” est un terme utilisé pour décrire la sensibilité du chocobo lorsqu'il interagit avec les autres. Vous pouvez favoriser la réceptivité de votre chocobo en lui donnant de nombreuses occasions de communiquer avec d'autres chocobos.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Energy” is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le discernement et la réceptivité sont collectivement désignés sous le terme d'"attributs mentaux".${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “L'énergie” est un terme utilisé pour décrire la quantité de puissance dont le chocobo a besoin pour rester actif pendant la journée. Si votre chocobo a beaucoup d'énergie, les plans de soins sont plus susceptibles de réussir et vous pouvez fournir plus de soins directs à votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Affection” is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez restaurer l'énergie de votre chocobo en le nourrissant, alors n'oubliez pas de ne pas sauter de repas après un emploi du temps chargé !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “L'affection” est l'attribut le plus important de tous. Votre plan de soins sera un échec si vous ne montrez pas à votre chocobo une affection appropriée !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez augmenter l'affection de votre chocobo en lui donnant des légumes verts et en prenant soin de lui régulièrement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: “Satisfaction” is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si vous voulez vraiment augmenter rapidement l’affection de votre chocobo, vous pouvez lui donner ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, mais je ne peux pas recommander de le faire sauf en cas de nécessité absolue.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: “La satisfaction” est un terme utilisé pour décrire si votre chocobo est rassasié ou affamé. Si votre chocobo est rassasié, il regagnera beaucoup d'énergie avant le lendemain.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: What would you like to ask about?
Phrase en Français: Cependant, lorsque le chocobo est très affamé, son énergie se rétablira à peine et son affection diminuera rapidement.${prompt}
Que souhaitez-vous savoir ?
Qu'est-ce qu'un emploi du temps de soins ?
Soins de base.
Repos.
Se promener.
Écouter de la musique.
Faire de l'exercice seul.
Faire de l'exercice en groupe.
Interagir avec les enfants.
Interagir avec les chocobos.
Porter des colis.
Se montrer en public.
Livrer des messages.
Fouiller les trésors.
Jouer dans une pièce de théâtre.

Phrase en Anglais: A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Rien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Un emploi du temps de soins est une série de plans que vous établissez pour votre chocobo afin que nous puissions en prendre soin pendant votre absence.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Comment vous voulez que nous prenions soin de votre chocobo chaque jour vous appartient entièrement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez enregistrer jusqu'à quatre plans à la fois, chacun pour une durée maximale de 7 jours (temps terrestre).${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Lorsque vous venez vérifier votre chocobo, nous vous fournirons un rapport sur les résultats. Vous devriez écouter attentivement le rapport et l'utiliser comme référence lorsque vous décidez d'un nouveau planning.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Avec le plan de soins de base, nous fournirons le niveau minimum de soins pour votre chocobo. Ce plan est le plus stable, et votre chocobo ne connaîtra probablement aucun changement soudain.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le plan de soins de base est bon pour ceux qui ne veulent pas que les caractéristiques de leur chocobo changent beaucoup ou qui ne sont pas encore sûrs du type de planning à choisir.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez sélectionner le plan de soins de base dès le début de l'élevage de votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le plan de repos parle de lui-même. Nous donnerons à votre chocobo du repos afin de restaurer son énergie et de guérir toute anomalie de statut.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, votre chocobo ne pourra pas manger de nourriture que vous lui donnez pendant le plan, car il sera plongé dans un sommeil profond.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Nous pouvons emmener votre chocobo se promener en ville pour améliorer ses attributs physiques de force et d'endurance. Cependant, cela aura un effet négatif sur ses attributs mentaux de discernement et de réceptivité.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Écouter de la musique améliorera les attributs mentaux de discernement et de réceptivité de votre chocobo. Cependant, cela aura un effet négatif sur ses attributs physiques de force et d'endurance.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Faire de l'exercice seul améliorera considérablement la force de votre chocobo. En revanche, ses attributs mentaux diminueront nettement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si le chocobo est fort, ce plan est assez efficace, mais si le chocobo est faible, alors vous ne devriez pas le pousser trop fort.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Faire de l'exercice avec d'autres chocobos renforcera l'endurance de votre animal. En revanche, ses attributs mentaux diminueront.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si le chocobo a une endurance élevée, ce plan est assez efficace, mais si l'endurance du chocobo est faible, alors vous ne devriez pas le pousser trop fort.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Interagir avec des enfants aide votre chocobo à devenir une créature plus discernante en interagissant avec les gens.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, ce plan aura un effet négatif sur les attributs physiques du chocobo, car aucun exercice physique intense n'est impliqué.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si le chocobo a un bon discernement, ce plan est assez efficace, mais si le chocobo n'a pas un bon discernement, alors vous ne devriez pas le pousser trop fort.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Interagir avec d'autres chocobos sur le terrain améliorera la réceptivité du chocobo en favorisant ses compétences de communication.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Mais comme l'accent est mis sur la communication et non sur l'exercice, ce plan aura un effet négatif sur les attributs physiques du chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si le chocobo a une bonne réceptivité, ce plan est assez efficace, mais si le chocobo n'a pas une bonne réceptivité, alors vous ne devriez pas le pousser trop fort.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez choisir de faire aider votre chocobo à livrer des colis. Non seulement cela améliorera ses attributs physiques, mais vous recevrez même un paiement pour vos services !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: L'inconvénient est que les attributs mentaux, l'énergie et l'affection de votre chocobo diminueront. Vous devez bien prendre soin de votre chocobo, sinon vous pourriez vous retrouver avec un traitement froid.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez choisir d'exposer votre chocobo au public, ce qui permettra à quiconque visitant les écuries de chocobos de jeter un coup d'œil à votre animal. Être au centre de l'attention aidera à améliorer les attributs mentaux de votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: L'inconvénient est que les attributs physiques, l'énergie et l'affection de votre chocobo diminueront. Vous devez bien prendre soin de votre chocobo par la suite. De plus, vous recevrez un paiement pour ce service.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez choisir de faire aider votre chocobo à livrer des messages officiels pour la nation. Non seulement cela améliorera sa force, mais vous recevrez même un paiement pour vos services !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, ce plan consomme beaucoup de l'énergie de votre chocobo, donc vous devriez bien le nourrir pour compenser.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez faire aider votre chocobo à creuser des trésors pour les finances du VCS. Cela améliorera également le discernement du chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le VCS vendra l'objet et utilisera l'argent pour le bénéfice de l'organisation, mais vous fournira un paiement pour vos services.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, ce plan consomme beaucoup de l'énergie de votre chocobo, donc vous devriez bien le nourrir pour compenser.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez choisir de faire jouer votre chocobo comme figurant dans une pièce de théâtre pour améliorer sa réceptivité.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: What would you like to ask about?
Phrase en Français: Vous recevrez un paiement en fonction de la performance du chocobo. Cependant, ce plan consomme beaucoup de l'énergie de votre chocobo, donc vous devriez bien le nourrir pour compenser.${prompt}
Que souhaitez-vous savoir ?
Une explication générale.
Surveiller votre chocobo.
Raconter une histoire.
Réprimander.
Participer à des compétitions.
Se promener.

Phrase en Anglais: In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Rien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: En plus de définir le planning du chocobo, vous pouvez également prendre soin directement de votre chocobo quand vous le souhaitez.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Prendre soin de votre chocobo augmentera son affection pour vous.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: En revanche, un chocobo qui reçoit trop de soins perdra plus rapidement de l'énergie lorsqu'il participera à des activités. Si vous ne faites que prendre soin de votre chocobo, il deviendra fatigué.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, ne pas prendre assez soin de votre chocobo aura un effet négatif sur votre relation, il est donc important de trouver un équilibre.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez surveiller votre chocobo quand vous le souhaitez.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Votre regard bienveillant peut communiquer encore plus qu'un contact physique et n'aura pas un effet très fatigant sur l'animal.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez raconter au chocobo une histoire que vous connaissez. Cela encouragera la sensibilité de l'animal.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: J'ai entendu dire qu'en écoutant l'histoire, le chocobo pourrait même se rendre compte qu'il a des pouvoirs qu'il n'avait jamais remarqués auparavant. (Je ne l'ai jamais vu arriver, cependant...)${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Parfois, votre chocobo pourrait commencer à se comporter en enfant gâté ou refuser de faire autre chose que de dormir. Dans de tels cas, vous devrez le réprimander fermement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cela fera honte à l'animal et aura un effet sur sa réceptivité.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Concourir contre d'autres chocobos cultivera l'esprit ambitieux de votre animal et est très efficace pour les chocobos ennuyés.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez emmener votre chocobo se promener dans le champ. Vous pourrez choisir plus de destinations à mesure que votre chocobo grandit.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: J'aime aussi sortir souvent le chocobo, mais je suis sûr qu'il préfère sortir avec vous.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: What would you like to know about?
Phrase en Français: Quitter les écuries de temps en temps permet à votre chocobo de découvrir de nouveaux paysages et de nouveaux sons. Peut-être que vous découvrirez même quelque chose de nouveau ensemble !${prompt}
Que voulez-vous savoir ?
Pourquoi l'alimentation est importante.
Légumes.
Herbes sauvages.
Carottes.
Vers.
Médicaments.
Pâtes.

Phrase en Anglais: Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Rien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les chocobos digèrent rapidement les aliments et sont donc souvent affamés.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cependant, ils restaurent également rapidement leur énergie. Si vous ne nourrissez pas correctement votre chocobo, il ne pourra pas récupérer suffisamment d'énergie.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les écuries de chocobos fourniront à votre chocobo la quantité minimale d'aliment nécessaire pour que l'animal survive, mais vous devez en fournir davantage pour garantir sa croissance saine.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: En même temps, nourrir votre chocobo trop peut entraîner des maux d'estomac. N'oubliez pas de trouver un équilibre tant dans la variété que dans la quantité de nourriture que vous donnez à votre animal !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Certains types de nourriture ont des effets spéciaux, il est donc important de ne pas négliger le régime alimentaire de votre chocobo si vous voulez élever un bon chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Just ${color: 5}trade${color: 1} the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il existe différentes méthodes pour acquérir ces types de nourriture spéciaux, donc restez à l'affût !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This is the standard variety of chocobo feed, among which ${item-plural: 0[2]} are most popular.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il vous suffit simplement d’ ${color: 5}échanger${color: 1} la nourriture avec un dresseur de chocobos expérimenté, et il la donnera à votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Chocobos also seem to enjoy ${item-plural: 0[2]} and ${item-plural: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il s’agit de la variété standard de nourriture pour chocobos, parmi lesquelles ${item-plural: 0[2]} sont les plus populaires.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: These greens are the most effective in satisfying a chocobo's hunger. Chocobos also enjoy the taste, which raises affection for their owner.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les chocobos semblent aussi apprécier les ${item-plural: 0[2]} et les ${item-plural: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Wildgrasses are a type of medicinal herb. They do not taste very good, but are highly effective at curing status abnormalities.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ces légumes sont les plus efficaces pour satisfaire la faim d'un chocobo. Les chocobos aiment aussi le goût, ce qui renforce l'affection pour leur propriétaire.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, for example, works well on wounds. So although they look similar to ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, the effects are different.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les herbes sauvages sont une sorte d'herbe médicinale. Elles n'ont pas très bon goût, mais sont très efficaces pour guérir les anomalies de statut.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: In addition, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} is effective for illness, and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} for a stomachache. It's a good idea to remember which herb to use in each situation.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, par exemple, fonctionne bien sur les blessures. Donc, bien qu’elles ressemblent à ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, les effets sont différents.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Carrots are high in nutrition, and will have an effect on the chocobo's strength and discernment.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: De plus, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} est efficace contre les maladies, et ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} contre les maux d’estomac. Il est judicieux de se souvenir de quelle herbe utiliser dans chaque situation.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]}, for example, affect the chocobo's physical attributes, and ${item-plural: 1[2]} are good for its mental attributes. ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 2[2]} are in a category of their own.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les carottes sont riches en nutriments et auront un effet sur la force et la perspicacité du chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Remember, though, that the results are very slight, and keeping a good care schedule is a far more efficient way to alter your chocobo's attributes.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]}, par exemple, affectent les attributs physiques du chocobo, et ${item-plural: 1[2]} sont bons pour ses attributs mentaux. ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 2[2]} sont dans une catégorie à part.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Using worms as feed can have a variety of effects. They might look disgusting, but their effectiveness is not to be ignored!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: N'oubliez cependant que les résultats sont très légers, et maintenir un bon planning de soins est un moyen bien plus efficace de modifier les attributs de votre chocobo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: For example, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} will dramatically increase your chocobo's affection, and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} will restore its energy.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Utiliser des vers comme nourriture peut avoir divers effets. Ils peuvent sembler répugnants, mais leur efficacité ne doit pas être négligée !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But watch out for the side effects... Give the chocobo a worm at the wrong time, and all your effort could come to nothing...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Par exemple, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} augmentera considérablement l’affection de votre chocobo, et ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} restaurera son énergie.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The most curious of all the worms is the ${item-singular: 0[2]}. At first it may not seem to have any effect, but looks are deceiving...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Mais attention aux effets secondaires... Donner un ver au chocobo au mauvais moment, et tous vos efforts pourraient être vains...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Medicines can cure a chocobo in the blink of an eye.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le plus curieux de tous les vers est le ${item-singular: 0[2]}. Au début, il peut ne pas sembler avoir d’effet, mais les apparences sont trompeuses...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} will restore your chocobo's energy in full, making it easier to care for and ensuring that the care schedule goes smoothly.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]} are effective for most status abnormalities, restoring instant health to your chocobo. Of course, you still need to continue caring for your chocobo so it can fully recover.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A potion can also help fill a chocobo's stomach, so they can be useful when you are short on feed.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]} sont efficaces pour la plupart des anomalies de statut, restaurant instantanément la santé de votre chocobo. Bien sûr, vous devez continuer à prendre soin de votre chocobo pour qu’il puisse récupérer entièrement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Feed can be ground into paste for chicks to eat.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Chicks can also eat regular feed, though.${prompt}

The Chocobo Hot and Cold Game has been designed by chocobo experts from around the globe to return the pep to your noble steed's step. All you need is to love your chocobo enough to want to help it. Don't you love your chocobo?${prompt}
Let your bird take part in the excitement, and before you know it, you'll have one lean, mean, pecking machine.${prompt}
And, not only will the bond between you and your bird become better...${prompt}
...but if you're lucky, you may find yourself belly-deep in bushels of bountiful booty!${prompt}
Can you think of a better way to spend a Windsday afternoon!? I know I can't!${prompt}
VCS officials have been spending the past few weeks burying chests filled with wondrous goodies in secret locations all over Vana'diel.${prompt}
All you have to do is find them, and they're yours. No strings attached!${prompt}
You love your bird, and I can tell by that drool trailing from the side of your mouth that you love treasure. So why not multiply the love? Love squared!${prompt}

Anyone who wants to participate in the Chocobo Hot and Cold Game will require a special ${color: 5}chocograph${color: 1} authorizing ${choice-player-gender}[him/her] to dig in a certain area.${prompt}
There are all kinds of chocographs for all kinds of treasure located in areas all over Vana'diel.${prompt}
Oh, and once you obtain one, it's yours for life, or until you set your gobbiebag on fire.${prompt}
Wait, I know what you're thinking--where do I get my hands on one of these chocographs?${prompt}

${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} is the tasty weed that you'll need to start the game.${prompt}

Take a clump to the area specified on a chocograph and set it out in front of you. Before you know it, your very own chocobo will come running (or walking, depending on how many carrots you've been giving it) to your side.${prompt}
Once it arrives, your map will open and you'll have the opportunity to confirm the general location of the buried treasure in that area.${prompt}

Well, first ride your chocobo out to the location indicated on your map.${prompt}

Depending on the distance you are from the treasure, the reaction of your bird will change.${prompt}
When you think you've found the X that marks the proverbial spot...${prompt}
...kick your chocobo's beak into 5th gear and start digging!${prompt}
Some treasure has been buried quite deep, so it may take a few tries before you actually reach anything.${prompt}
But with a cup of persistence and a 1/4 tablespoon of luck, you'll uncover a chest filled with surprises that even Pandora would appreciate.${prompt}
Then, all you have to do is open it and pocket your prize. It's as easy as Rolanberry pie!${prompt}
To maximize your “hot” and ice your “cold,” you'll want to know how chocobo abilities can help you get your eyes off, and your hands on, the prize.${prompt}
The ones that will help you most are “Treasure Finder,” “Burrow,” and “Bore.”${prompt}
Burrow and Bore will allow you to go deeper with each dig, helping you reach the chest before your bird grows too tired.${prompt}
Treasure Finder does just that--helps you find the treasure easier by honing your chocobo's sense of smell.${prompt}
Now, this part is the most important, so I need you to turn off your linkshell and give me your undivided attention.${prompt}
All this digging can put a lot of strain on your chocobo.${prompt}
The more you order your bird to dig, the more tired it will become. Overwork it, and it will simply give up and refuse to dig anymore.${prompt}
If that's the case, you'll have to hop off your chocobo and let it recover. In other words it's game over, man. Game over!${prompt}
Locating the chest in as few digs as possible will be the key to everybody going home happy.${prompt}

Welcome to the Chocobo Racing Association's (CRA) ${choice: 0}[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst] branch.
This service desk is here to accommodate our beginning and intermediate racers.${prompt}
I am sorry, but there are no races scheduled at the moment.${prompt}
Participation in our organization's races requires that you either possess ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or currently have your own full-grown chocobo.${prompt}

If possible, we would like you to join us, and help show those trainers in ${choice: 0}[Bastok and Windurst/San d'Oria and Windurst/San d'Oria and Bastok] which racing team is truly the best in Vana'diel.${prompt}
You are now an official member of the CRA's ${choice: 0}[San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst] racing team.${prompt}
Please come back if you ever change your mind!${prompt}
What would you like to know?
How do I register for a race?
How do I prepare for a race?
What kind of races are there?
Our original plan was to establish locations across Vana'diel where people could test their birds' skills.${prompt}
We felt that this would help us maintain breeder motivation, which in turn would ensure healthier, happier chocobos. A “win-win situation,” as we like to call it in the business.${prompt}
However, as rumors of these new facilities began to leak out into the world, people began speculating about the possibility of officially sanctioned chocobo races...${prompt}
The VCS could not ignore the voice of the masses, and it was not long before a meeting was held, a vote was taken, and the CRA was formed.${prompt}
And that's why I'm here, trying to enlist you and other top breeders into our noble ranks.${prompt}
Oh, and for our more seasoned veterans who feel there are no challenges left for them here at the track, the CRA has finished preparing a new race. And rumor has that it's a doozie!${prompt}
First of all, your chocobo must be fully grown. It doesn't matter if you are still tending to it, or if it has been sent to pasture, as long as it is large enough to ride.${prompt}
Next, you must bring me either ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. This is all I will require. There are no hidden fees.${prompt}
As your chocobo develops, be sure to re-register it. This will ensure that your steed is provided with the equipment that most suits its current condition.${prompt}
Finally, you may only register one chocobo at a time, but are free to register a new bird whenever you wish. You need only speak with me to make any necessary changes.${prompt}
Once you have registered your chocobo and entered it in a competition, the CRA will proceed in assigning it a licensed jockey.${prompt}
Before each race you will be given the opportunity to give the jockey specific orders on his or her riding style.${prompt}
In addition to these orders, you can also provide the jockey with items to use while riding, as well as equipment to improve your chocobo's performance.${prompt}

Before a race, you can also check the strengths and weaknesses of the other participating chocobos. It is recommended that you use this data when deciding on what orders to give, or which items to equip.${prompt}
Depending on your chocobo's performance in select CRA-sanctioned races, you may or may not receive a prize consisting of VCS-mint ${color: 5}chocobucks${color: 1}.${prompt}
Chocobucks can be used to purchase items, as well as upgrade your mount. Chocobucks are also required to participate in official races.${prompt}
Currently, players can earn up to, but no more than, 1000 chocobucks. However, this may change without notice.${prompt}
There are two main types of races.${prompt}
The first type is called an ${color: 5}official race${color: 1}. To participate in one of these, you will require chocobucks.${prompt}
Placing in an official race will earn you gil. The more races you complete, the more respected you will become in the breeder community.${prompt}
You may also take part in an official race as often as needed to complete the specified objectives.${prompt}

However, after some of the more grueling races, you may be required to wait before entering the next. This is to give your chocobo, as well as the others, an opportunity to rest before running again.${prompt}
The second type of race is called a ${color: 5}free run${color: 1}. Unlike the official races, these can be run at any time, regardless of the results of a previous match.${prompt}

You must pay a fee in gil to participate in free runs, but you will have the opportunity to earn chocobucks depending on your chocobo's performance. You can join as many free runs as you wish in a single day (Earth time), but extra fees may be required for each additional race. (Stable hands have to make a living, too!)${prompt}
The CRA is split up into three racing teams representing Bastok, Windurst, and San d'Oria.${prompt}
Each team has its own skilled jockeys, and offers unique services that cannot be obtained at the other two.${prompt}
Breeders are allowed to register with any team they like, and may change their affiliation at any time.${prompt}
In the event that you wish to leave a racing team, all official race results, as well as earned chocobucks, will be saved.${prompt}
You never have to worry that your past accomplishments may be deleted and lost forever. You only need rejoin the team to restore all your old data.${prompt}
Anyway, there is no harm in visiting all three racing teams to find which one suits you best (though I know you'll choose this one).${prompt}

What would you like to know about?
Shops, as well as attendants to assist you in siging up your chocobo for a race, are located on the promenade.${prompt}
It can be found just south of here.${prompt}
The promenade itself is split into eastern and western halves, both of which house all of the same facilities. Be sure to stop by and have a look when you get a chance.${prompt}
Attendants at the chocobet centers are there to assist you with acquiring ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, as well as collecting your winnings.${prompt}

There are a total of five centers readily available for your convenience, each of which are located near the transportation portals. There are two to the east and west of here, and one just to the north.${prompt}
All chocobet centers are capable of providing the same services.${prompt}
The grandstand faces the racetrack itself, and allows spectators to sit and enjoy the races in comfort.${prompt}
To get there, just follow the red carpet all the way through the betting area. You can't miss it.${prompt}
The standard admission fee is ${number: 0} gil. Patrons who possess ${keyitem-article: 1[2]} may enter free of charge.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${keyitem-plural: 1[2]} will be provided anytime you purchase ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or sign up for a race.${prompt}
Your ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} will become invalid as soon as you leave the grandstand. Reentry will require you to pay an additional admission fee.${prompt}
This racetrack is equipped with portals to transport our patrons to any of the three nations, as well as Jeuno and Al Zahbi.${prompt}

As you can see, we are regularly visited by a multitude of race fans, breeders, and jockeys from every realm imaginable. We have therefore relegated each portal to a single destination in an attempt to avoid congestion.${prompt}
For the same reasons, we ask that visitors refrain from setting up bazaars while here. Violators of this rule will be severely punished.
Guides can be found throughout the premises waiting to assist you.${prompt}
They can help by transporting you to the location of your choice.${prompt}
This service is provided free of charge, so please don't hesitate to make use of it.${prompt}
What would you like to know about?
A race chocobo's owner or jockey may join one of the three racing teams by registering at the appropriate VCS branch.${prompt}
Each nation's Team Victory Points are the sum total of all of its members' Solo Victory Points. The Team Victory Point totals are then used to determine the overall weekly standings.${prompt}
In order to race your chocobo here, we ask that you please affiliate yourself first with one of the three teams.${prompt}
For details, please check with your local CRA racing center.${prompt}
The races held here are almost identical to the official and private races held at the other racetracks.${prompt}
What distinguishes our races is the fact that victories here qualify you to collect larger cash purses, as well as Victory Points.${prompt}
Eligibility to participate in the higher-level races will require a certain number of Solo Victory Points.${prompt}
Depending on a team's weekly standings, its members may suffer certain eligibility restrictions. At the same time, they may also be privy to certain benefits.${prompt}
The teams in second and third place will have the advantage of being allowed more entry positions in any given race, while those of the leading team are restricted.${prompt}
The leading team will, however, be granted the privilege of selecting higher-quality saddles for their race chocobos.${prompt}
The CRA reserves the right to impose a handicap system when it is determined that the gap in skill between chocobos is simply too great to make for a fair race.${prompt}
In such an event, the “less endowed” of the chocobos will be granted certain enhancing effects, such as Haste or Refresh.${prompt}
Whether handicaps will be enforced or not will be determined after signups are complete. Make sure to keep an eye on your chocobo's settings.${prompt}
Each race title will include a code, such as C4. This code is the “race grade.”${prompt}
For example, a “C4 Chocobo Race” would indicate a typical grade 4 race.${prompt}
We have four race grades, ranging from C4 to C1. The lower the number, the higher the grade. This, of course, means larger entry fees, but also more prize money.${prompt}

No matter which race you enter, upon completion you will be prevented from joining any other races for a period of 20 hours (Earth time). Higher-grade races carry larger purses, so most racers like to use their opportunities to go after those.${prompt}
Solo Victory Points will be awarded to you every race, depending on how well you finish.${prompt}
As your Solo Victory Points accumulate, your chocobo will be able to gain entry to high-grade races.${prompt}
Should a racer return to the circuit after an absence of four weeks or more, the CRA will be forced to deduct a number of Solo Victory Points.${prompt}

Only on the rarest of occasions will such penalties be imposed. However, there are some races in which you will be unable to participate if you do not have a certain amount of Solo Victory Points in your possession.${prompt}
Also, obtaining Solo Victory Points will also grant your nation Team Victory Points.${prompt}
The three teams are in constant competition with one another, and a weekly ranking system is in place based on Team Victory Point totals.${prompt}
As a team climbs up in rank, certain benefits will follow. You may see new items available for purchase with chocobucks, preferential treatment at the races, and so on.${prompt}
Keep in mind that should you change your team affiliation, you will be forced to forfeit any accumulated Solo Victory Points.${prompt}
We have a total of four races that run in succession.${prompt}
Each race has its own dedicated signup window. Here there will be four attendants ready to serve all your racing needs.${prompt}
Even if the race registration at one window closes, registration for the next race will begin immediately at the neighboring window.${prompt}
Races will be held one after the other, so you'll have plenty of chances to watch and bet. Sit back, relax, and enjoy!${prompt}
What would you like to hear more about?
There are a few facts that you should know before running in a race.${prompt}
First of all, you absolutely must be affiliated with one of the three official racing teams. These, as you may already know, are San d'Oria, Bastok, and Windurst.${prompt}
Secondly, it is required that your bird be registered as a “race chocobo,” for obvious reasons. No race chocobo, no race.${prompt}
Thirdly, you will be responsible for providing your own items to be used during the race. The CRA leaves this to the racer's discretion...${prompt}
All of these services can be provided at any racing center, but to facilitate the registration process it is recommended that you conduct all such affairs at the appropriate branch.${prompt}
A racing fee is necessary to gain entry into a chocobo race. The racing center will inform you of the cost, so please be sure to pay when signing up for a race.${prompt}
Also, when signing up to race, you will be able to choose a saddle, as well as the lane in which your chocobo will race.${prompt}

There are multifarious saddles at the rider's disposal, each of which will affect your chocobo's conditioning. In addition, the types of saddles available will change depending on your team's current ranking.${prompt}
There are a total of eight lanes, but general conditions for all of them are the same. Feel free to race in the lane of your choice.${prompt}
Setting these options will complete the signup process. You will then be given ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, which you will need to exchange later to collect any winnings.${prompt}

In the event that you should lose or misplace your ${item-singular: 0[2]}, you will be unable to collect any prize money, chocobucks, or Victory Points that you may be entitled to. I cannot stress enough how important it is to hold on to it.${prompt}
The races can be viewed from our grandstand area. Take a seat and cheer on your bird!${prompt}
You will be eligible for prize money if your chocobo places either first, second, or third.${prompt}
To collect, simply hand in the ${item-singular: 0[2]} you received during race signup at any signup center.${prompt}
The amount of gil, chocobucks, and Victory Points you qualify to receive will be based upon your bird's placement.${prompt}
You will lose the right to collect your winnings from a race exactly one week after that race has ended.${prompt}
After participating in a race, your chocobo will be unable to join any other races for a period of 20 hours (Earth time).${prompt}
This pertains only to races held here, and will not affect your eligibility for races held at any other racetracks.${prompt}
We have implemented these restrictions here as to allow the greatest number of participants' entry into our races. Your patience and understanding are appreciated.${prompt}
What would you like to ask?
Chocobetting is a form of entertainment where bettors attempt to pick the two birds that will finish first and second in a race.${prompt}
To make it a bit more interesting, the bettor can then wager on their picks in increments of 100 gil.${prompt}
Should lady luck smile upon you and your picks hit, you can win prize money, the amount of which is determined by the odds for that race.${prompt}
For example, let's say that you were to bet ten quills (1000 gil) on Entries No. 5 and No. 7.${prompt}

And let's say that the toteboard showed the odds for the race at 110 gil. If your picks were to finish as the top two birds, you would be eligible to collect 1100 gil in winnings, for a total profit of 100 gil.${prompt}
Of course, it goes without saying that should your picks not have the fortune of finishing in the top two places, you will receive absolutely no gil.${prompt}
The gambler's fallacy is our mantra here at the racetrack! Remember, you are special! Let it ride!${prompt}
To place a chocobet, you must obtain ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} from the chocobet center. ${prompt}
For any single ${item-singular: 0[2]}, a bettor may purchase up to 999 quills. Each quill costs 100 gil.${prompt}
We highly recommend that you obtain information on the chocobos you will be betting on before purchasing your ticket. It is always good to know where your money is going.${prompt}
Odds determine how much gil you will receive in winnings per quill on your chocobet ticket.${prompt}

Winnings are calculated by taking the total monetary sum of all bets for any given pairing. For example, should ten bettors each place the same 100-quill (10,000 gil) chocobet, the total used to determine the winnings would be 100,000 gil.${prompt}
It goes without saying that not all bettors will be winners. The money from losing bets is used to pay off the winners.${prompt}

What this means is that if you place a bet on an unseemly chocobo pairing, or pick two birds without much money riding on them, and are fortunate enough to win, you can make quite a tidy sum.${prompt}

Toteboards display the odds at both the chocobet center as well as the grandstand. Toteboards have eight columns with the number on top of each column representing one chocobo, and the number to the left of each column representing another. If your bet is for chocobos No. 2 and No. 5, check the #2 column to see how much a 2-5 bet will pay per quill.${prompt}
The odds are constantly changing right up until the race begins. If the number of bets on a popular chocobo pairing keeps increasing, then consequently the odds will go down.${prompt}
Even if you place a large bet early on, the odds may still change as time passes. So take your time and consider carefully.${prompt}
Chocobets can be placed as soon as the signup period for a race has ended. The betting window will close several minutes before the race begins.${prompt}
Make sure to get your bet in on time. Even if you are in the middle of placing a bet, it will be cancelled if you exceed the allowed time window by even a single second.${prompt}
Once the race is finished, you can exchange your ${item-singular: 0[2]} at any chocobet center to collect your winnings.${prompt}
Without ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} you will be unable to collect your winnings, so make sure not to lose it.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} is valid for up to one week (Earth time) after completion of the race for which it was purchased.${prompt}
Should one week pass, we will be unable to accept the ticket, so it is always best to cash out as soon as possible.${prompt}

This service area is here to accommodate our more experienced and accomplished racers.${prompt}

My apologies, ${choice-player-gender}[sir/ma'am], but it appears that you have yet to conduct all of the necessary processing at the service area for advanced and veteran racers. Please speak to the attendants there for further assistance.${prompt}
Which would you like to hear about?
How do I register for a race?
How do I prepare for a race?
What kinds of races are there?

With the establishment of the Chocobo Circuit and the introduction of chocobo races, the hidden talents of a number of chocobos across Vana'diel finally had a venue in which to come to fruition.${prompt}
As the next step, the CRA recognized these rare and valuable talents, and developed a new, special kind of race to showcase them even more than before!${prompt}
Without the interference of jockeys, breeders can now pit their chocobos head-to-head against a number of monster species in brutal, raw, no-holds-barred racing! ${prompt}
Even some of the CRA's very own best and brightest chocobos will be entering into these races geared specifically to our veteran clientele.
What more thrilling way to spend a day at the races than to see Vana'diel's most elite chocobos competing against its most fiendish monsters!?${prompt}
First of all, your chocobo must be fully grown. It doesn't matter if you are still tending to it, or if it has been sent to pasture, as long as it is large enough to ride.${prompt}
Next, you must bring me either ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. This is all I will require. There are no hidden fees.${prompt}
As your chocobo develops, be sure to re-register it. This will ensure that your steed is provided with the equipment that most suits its current condition.${prompt}
Finally, you may only register one chocobo at a time, but are free to register a new bird whenever you wish. You need only speak with me to make any necessary changes.${prompt}

Since these races are geared towards our more veteran racers and will not make use of jockeys, all in-race conduct is based solely on the chocobos themselves. The CRA wants these races to be as pure as possible!${prompt}
The same philosophy applies to the usage of items as well. Simply preset the items you wish for your chocobo to have at its disposal.
It will use them as it sees fit based on real-time assessment of racing conditions.${prompt}
Many breeders are distressed by these rules, but we assure you there is no need for concern.

If your chocobo has progressed far enough in the Chocobo Circuit to even be participating in the Monster Races, it is a given that it has enough know-how to use its items wisely. Have faith in your bird.${prompt}
Also, as with other races in the past, you will be able to check on the strengths and weaknesses of your opponents at this service area.
Many breeders like to use this information for developing their race strategies, and we encourage you to do the same.${prompt}
Depending on your chocobo's performance in select CRA-sanctioned races, you may or may not receive a prize consisting of VCS-mint ${color: 5}chocobucks${color: 1}.${prompt}
Chocobucks can be used to purchase items, as well as upgrade your mount. Chocobucks are also required to participate in official races.${prompt}
Currently, players can earn up to, but no more than, 1000 chocobucks. However, this may change without notice.${prompt}
There are two main types of races.${prompt}
The first type is called an ${color: 5}official race${color: 1}. To participate in one of these, you will require chocobucks.${prompt}
Placing in an official race will earn you gil. The more races you complete, the more respected you will become in the breeder community.${prompt}
You may also take part in an official race as often as needed to complete the specified objectives.${prompt}

However, after some of the more grueling races, you may be required to wait before entering the next. This is to give your chocobo, as well as the others, an opportunity to rest before running again.${prompt}

The second type of race is called a ${color: 5}free run${color: 1}. Unlike the official races, these can be run at any time, regardless of the results of a previous match. In addition, you will have the opportunity to earn chocobucks depending on your chocobo's performance.${prompt}
You are not able to sign up for free runs at this location. To do so, please visit the appropriate service area for beginning and intermediate racers.
The CRA is split up into three racing teams representing Bastok, Windurst, and San d'Oria.${prompt}
Each team has its own skilled jockeys, and offers unique services that cannot be obtained at the other two.${prompt}
Breeders are allowed to register with any team they like, and may change their affiliation at any time.${prompt}
In the event that you wish to leave a racing team, all official race results, as well as earned chocobucks, will be saved.${prompt}
You never have to worry that your past accomplishments may be deleted and lost forever. You only need rejoin the team to restore all your old data.${prompt}
Anyway, there is no harm in visiting all three racing teams to find which one suits you best (though I know you'll choose this one).${prompt}
Your opponents in the official monster races will be any of a host of beasts reared and trained by racing aficionado and announcer extraordinaire, Markovich.${prompt}
We ensure all participating breeders that these monsters are in no way enhanced or engineered for racing excellence.
The CRA has been adamant about maintaining race participants to as close to their natural state of being as possible.${prompt}
Though each variety of monster does in fact possess characteristic abilities and traits.
And they have undergone extensive training to optimize their use of these in races.${prompt}
As with the chocobos, however, the monsters will be absent jockeys of any kind.
It is possible, and expected, that they will often unleash their wild, animalistic instincts on the racetrack.
In the spirit of drawing crowds, the CRA has also elected to place some of their finest birds on the racing roster as well.
Breeders can also expect to see other superior-class chocobos taking part.
It's going to take a lot more than just speed and endurance to win these races!${prompt}
Finally, in the absence of jockeys, finish-line sensors will be employed.
These devices will be attached to the contestants' ankles, or in the absence of ankles, some other such appropriate place.${prompt}
And now, Markovich's undeniably unorthodox, and arguably downright unethical, monster race is about to begin!${prompt}
Following such a fine showing in the Dueler's Race, the next contest is about to start! Who will be the last beast standing?${prompt}
Warning! The next race contains monsters of unprecedented nastiness. Enter at your own risk! The name says it all!${prompt}
What's this? We've been asked to pass along yet another challenge, this time from an anonymous source!
I'm not altogether clear on what is about to transpire...${prompt}
The games are over, ladies and gentlemen. Markovich is laying it all on the table. Here come his most ferocious beasts to date!${prompt}
This is the moment you've all been waiting for. The CRA has brought its racing elite out from the stables!
The treacherous offroad track is fraught with perils! And an absolutely awe-inspiring trophy is ready for the winner!
Bragging rights for life are on the line!${prompt}

Princess Sakura, your loyal subjects eagerly await your return. Let us now return to the land of chocobos! ${prompt}
I'm sorry, but I can't go.${prompt}
